target: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SEQ_00<tab>スイの里のマヒワは、なにやら困ったことがあるようだ。
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_01<tab>マヒワの長男に「呆れる」をする
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_03<tab>マヒワの次男に「呆れる」をする

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_000<tab>We, the Raen, left the surface long ago that we might forge ourselves a peaceful life under the sea. Maintaining such serenity, however, is not always easy─my two sons can attest to that.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_000私たちは、争いが絶えぬ陸を棄て、
この水底の里にて、互いを思いやりつつ暮らしております。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_001<tab>From the crack of dawn until dusk they fight. Lately, things have started to escalate and they have begun to trouble the entire village with their spats.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_001しかし、幼き子どもたちには難しいようで……。
我が子らは、顔を合わせればすぐに喧嘩を始めてしまいます。
これでは、里の者たちにも迷惑となりましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_002<tab>I have scolded them on multiple occasions, telling them that such disturbing behavior is unacceptable. They, however, still refuse to listen. Perhaps you can try having a word with them?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_002私も散々注意しておりますが、改まる気配がなく……。
よろしければ、貴方様から我が子らを諭していただけませんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_004<tab>You can start with my eldest son. He should be over by the racks of dried fish. If he attempts to start a fight with you when you approach him, I suggest you respond with a resounding <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. That should stop him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_004長男ならば、干物を眺めておりましょう。
彼と話してみて、喧嘩の種に気付かれたら、
「呆れる」素振りをしてみてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_003<tab>Should he try to start a fight with you, I suggest you look him in the eye and respond with a resounding <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_003長男ならば、干物を眺めておりましょう。
彼と話してみて、喧嘩の種に気付かれたら、
「呆れる」素振りをしてみてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_010<tab>Huh? What do you want? Stop wasting my time. Hurry up and say what it is you've come to say!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_010なんだよ、あんた。
用があるなら、しゃきしゃき喋れよ！
俺、のろまなヤツ嫌いなんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>By his cocky attitude you sense Mahiwa's eldest son is trying to pick a fight with you. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_011乱暴な口のきき方は、喧嘩の種になりそうだ。
「マヒワの長男」に対し、「呆れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_012<tab>I will tell you one last time. If there is something you have come to say to me, say it! If not, begone from my sight!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_012だーかーらー、用があるなら、しゃきしゃき喋れよ！
のろまな奴を待ってられるほど、ヒマじゃないんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>By his cocky attitude you sense Mahiwa's eldest son is trying to pick a fight with you. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_013乱暴な口のきき方は、喧嘩の種になりそうだ。
「マヒワの長男」に対し、「呆れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_020<tab>Huh? <var 1A 02 /var>Huh<var 1A 01 /var>!? Wh-Who do you think you are to take such a lofty tone with me!? Well, if it is a fight you want, it is a fight you will get!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_020なっ、なんだ、その態度は！？
俺に喧嘩を売ろうってのか！？
見知らぬ俺に、よくそんな失礼なマネできるもんだな！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_021<tab>But wait... Perhaps this is what Mother meant when she said I had an unpleasant attitude. Now that I think on it, I have often done to my brother what you just did to me. Maybe it's what caused our constant brawls.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_021いや、待てよ、俺も似たようなもんか……？
もしや、母ちゃんがいつも言ってたのは、こういうことか？
俺が乱暴な口をきくもんだから、弟と喧嘩になっちまうのか！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_022<tab>I understand now. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...and my apologies for trying to fight you. If you happen to see my brother, please tell him I am sorry.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_022そうか……ありがとうよ！
弟に謝りたいが……まだ今は、喧嘩になっちまいそうだ……。
代わりに、よろず屋の傍にいる弟に謝っておいてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_030<tab>You came to tell me my brother says he is sorry? I do not believe you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_030は……兄ちゃんがボクに謝ってるって？
そんなこと、見知らぬ人に突然言われても、
信じられるわけないでしょ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Mahiwa's younger son appears to be in a sour mood and seems to be looking to take it out on someone. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_032不機嫌そうな態度は、喧嘩の種になりそうだ。
「マヒワの次男」に対し、「呆れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_033<tab>Please, leave me. I just want to be alone!
target: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_033<tab>ちょっと、ひとりにしてくれないかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Mahiwa's younger son appears to be in a sour mood and seems to be looking to take it out on someone. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_034不機嫌そうな態度は、喧嘩の種になりそうだ。
「マヒワの次男」に対し、「呆れる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_060<tab>So my eldest son has finally come around? That is wonderful to hear! I only hope you see the same amount of success when you speak with my younger son.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_060なんと、長男は、わかってくれましたか……！
次男は、よろず屋の傍におりましょう。
同じように、喧嘩の種に気付いたら、「呆れて」みてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_040<tab>What do you─ You did that because I seem grumpy!? No, you misunderstand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_040え、ボクが不機嫌そうだから呆れてるの？
誤解だよ……どうして兄ちゃんが、
謝ろうとしているのか考えてたんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_041<tab><sigh> Mother also often comments that I seem sullen. I am not─I simply do not have much to say. Perhaps my brother has also been mistaking my silence for anger and that is why he shouts at me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_041そういえば、母ちゃんからも言われてたっけ……。
お前は無口だから、不機嫌に見えるって。
だから、いつも兄ちゃんと喧嘩になってたんだね……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_042<tab>I must go and sort this out with him. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You have made me realize how important it is to let others know what I am thinking. I shall go find my brother now!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_042謝らなくちゃいけないのは、ボクの方だ……。
これからは、思ってることはちゃんと説明するよ。
さっそく、兄ちゃんを探しにいってみる！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_050<tab>Perhaps now they will be able to find a way to reconcile their differences. Thank you. Until you came along I was at a loss as to what to do.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_050まあ、ふたりとも歩み寄り始めてくれましたか……！
やはり、思い切って貴方に依頼してよかったです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_051<tab>By nature, we avoid using any harsh words or actions. As such, most of what I have to say is easily brushed aside by my children.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_051私たちは、争いを避けようと言葉を真綿にくるみすぎて、
真意が正しく伝わらないことがあるもので……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_052<tab>You, however, have gotten through to them where I could not. Now the people of the village need not be disturbed by their angry shouts any longer. Please accept this small gift as a token of my appreciation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_052おかげで、里の者たちに迷惑をかけずにすみそうです。
なんとお礼を申し上げてよいやら、感謝の言葉もございません。
少ないですが感謝の印を、お受け取りください。
